Lyric:
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[ti:Done With Love]
[ar:Zedd]
[al:True Colors]
[00:03.550]Baby, if you're done with love, who's gonna hold you tonight? 
[00:11.450]Are you done with love so they can't hurt you tomorrow? 
[00:18.320]You don't wanna keep on swimming in the ocean you've cried 
[00:26.500]But I won't let you drown, I'll pull you back to the shallow 
[00:33.320]Cause all I ever really wanted 
[00:40.040]In this short life was you 
[00:48.300]Tell me who took your heart away 
[00:51.290]And do you know it breaks mine when I hear you say 
[00:54.970]That you're done with love? 
[00:58.410]Oh, you are done with love 
[01:03.330]Give me one night to mend the pain 
[01:06.220]Because the second we touch, you'll forget the day 
[01:09.900]You were done with love 
[01:13.430]Oh, you were done with love 
[01:17.940]If you were down with love 
[01:48.410]Woah,Give me one night to mend the pain
